name: Seraphica (DragonLilly)
description:
Seraphica, an angel-in-training descends from heaven to find out why the demon army is suddenly collecting humans. What will she discover and how can she stop it? Blast your way through 3 normal mode stages with 3 alternate harder stages leading up to a final boss and a true last boss if you're good enough!

Z - Bomb / X - Shoot
Shift - Select / Enter - Start
Arrow Keys - Move Player

Some controller support enabled. 
Practice mode selectable on main menu by inputting select 6 times.
(can not obtain true end via practice mode)

Unzip and run Seraphica.exe
